Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1967...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 5/31/1968 (Going to CHC: LF R. Zisk, P P. Borbon Sr.. Going to NYM: P B. Lee, CF L. Brock, P S. Shea)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Los Angeles on 1/31/1969 (Going to LA: RF R. Zisk, P P. Splittorff. Going to CHC: CF C. James)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Minnesota on 7/7/1969 (Going to LA: SS D. Campbell. Going to MIN: CF M. Rivers, C T. Simmons, RF R. Zisk)...
Had first career hit on 4/19/1971, off Dave A. Roberts (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/11/1971, off Dick Radatz (BOS)...
